meta.title: WaiWai — AI agents for hiring and recruiting
meta.description: An AI platform that automates sourcing, outreach, and candidate coordination. Close roles faster and give your HR team back precious time.
meta.keywords: AI recruiting, hiring automation, digital recruiter, HR technology, talent acquisition, AI for HR, candidate sourcing, ATS automation, automated outreach, recruitment automation
meta.ogTitle: WaiWai — AI agents for hiring and recruiting
meta.ogDescription: An AI platform that automates sourcing, outreach, and candidate coordination. Close roles faster and give your HR team back precious time.
meta.twitterTitle: WaiWai — AI agents for hiring and recruiting
meta.twitterDescription: An AI platform that automates sourcing, outreach, and candidate coordination. Close roles faster and give your HR team back precious time.

hero.title: AI recruiters that keep your hiring pipeline moving
hero.subtitle: We source qualified talent, run personalised conversations, and schedule interviews while your HR team focuses on selection.

chat.emptyState: Ask the blog anything to start the conversation.

capabilities.title: Capabilities
paragraphs: WaiWai is a digital recruiter: it sources candidates from LinkedIn, job boards, communities, enriches profiles, and segments them by role requirements.
The agent messages candidates via email, Telegram, and LinkedIn, answers follow-up questions, and nurtures interest until the interview.

items.question: Can you deploy the LLM on-premises?
items.answer: Yes, we can run the LLM within your corporate perimeter to keep data secure.

items.question: Which LLMs do you use?
items.answer: We orchestrate models from the Qwen and Gemma families.

items.question: How do you handle localisation in Russia?
items.answer: Our models are fine-tuned for the Russian context and comply with regulations such as Federal Law 152-FZ.

items.question: Do you have ready-to-use solutions?
items.answer: Our first sales and hiring agents are already live and generating revenue for clients.

sales.title: WaiSales
sales.description: Finds leads, sends personalized outreach, and keeps the conversation going so you can close more deals.

hr.title: WaiHR
hr.description: Sources candidates and chats with them, sorts inbound requests, and gives recruiters their time back.

automation.title: Automation Agent
automation.description: Automates repetitive operations, updates systems of record, and escalates only edge cases.

custom.title: WaiCustom
custom.description: We build AI solutions for your goals: define KPIs, continually improve the agents, and stay accountable for performance gains.

training.title: WowUni
training.description: We train corporate teams to work with AI—from the basics to rolling smart assistants into your business processes.

egor.name: Egor Lukin
egor.description: Full-stack software engineer with 10 years of experience. Worked at Evil Martians, Aviasales, Dualboot, and early-stage startups. Launched his own SaaS products.

pavel.name: Pavel Kalashnikov
pavel.description: 13 years in commercial development, led large LMS, HoReCa, and media projects. Open-source enthusiast.

anastasiaM.name: Anastasia Moshina
anastasiaM.description: Ruby on Rails developer who helped build large fintech products. Over five years of engineering experience.

aleksey.name: Alexey Pavlov
aleksey.description: Former editor-in-chief at Sostav with 12 years in journalism and PR.

vyacheslav.name: Vyacheslav Ermolenko
vyacheslav.description: Eight years designing digital products. Led design teams and crafted design systems for fintech, Web3, business, and cultural projects.

anastasiaS.name: Anastasia Soboleva
anastasiaS.description: Full-stack QA engineer with 5+ years of experience. Helps teams ship stable, user-friendly products by catching critical issues before release.

mik.name: Mik Wiseman
mik.description: Founder of WaiWai, launched nine startups; graduate of the MSU Faculty of Computational Mathematics and Cybernetics and winner of international AI hackathons.

waiComputer.name: Wai Computer
waiComputer.description: Twelve years of uninterrupted work without vacations or sick days. Speaks every programming language at once, occasionally freezes on Zoom calls, dreams of a promotion to a quantum computer.

alphaBank.title: Alfa Bank
alphaBank.description: Developed a bank-grade AI enablement program that meets security requirements. Rolled out masterclasses and workshops to automate routine workflows.

falcone.title: Falcone
falcone.description: Deployed a sales agent for the logistics service: WaiWai builds e-commerce lead lists, runs nurture campaigns, and books demos for the sales team.

akBarsBank.title: Ak Bars Bank
akBarsBank.description: Configured an HR agent to close analyst roles. The agent enriches hh.ru and LinkedIn profiles, manages conversations, schedules interviews, and hands off motivated talent straight to HR.

ontico.title: Ontico Conferences
ontico.description: Launched a sales agent for the conference team: WaiWai targets tech companies, runs partnership outreach, and secures booth and ticket commitments.

kodix.title: Pro Codex
kodix.description: Built a dual-mode agent for sales and HR: WaiWai sources enterprise leads, qualifies engineers, keeps both pipelines in sync, and confirms meetings.

cta.title: While competitors cold-call resumes, your candidates chat with WaiWai
